name: Lengua
description: Testing how a tongue can be seen through the camera. It's always interesting to take self-portraits, to see oneself from different places, to see oneself from afar or very closely, from behind or from the front, ... It's often revealing and also very intimate, being with oneself looking through a lens. Somehow one is inside and outside, it's as if one occupies the whole room. Photography is magic.  Self-portrait - Digital photography + handmade filter - @BarbaraBezina
